disallowed_reasons.no_major_level: Only one distinct assignment found. At least two are needed for a pie chart
disallowed_reasons.minor_levels_present: Minor levels are present (cannot plot slices for more than one level)
disallowed_reasons.multiple_years: Multiple years are present (pie charts require exactly one year)
disallowed_reasons.multiple_periods: Multiple periods are present (pie charts require exactly one period)
disallowed_reasons.mixed_sign: Mixed positive and negative values are not allowed for pie charts
